requirements.text: Create a hero section with welcoming headline, brief introduction about the coaching services, and a call-to-action button
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is prominently displayed at the top of the page
Headline clearly communicates the coaching value proposition
Call-to-action button is visible and encourages user engagement

requirements.text: Build a services section displaying at least 3-4 coaching service offerings with descriptions
acceptanceCriteria: Services are presented in an organized grid or card layout
Each service includes a title and description
Section is visually distinct from other page sections

requirements.text: Create an about section explaining the coaching approach, methodology, and philosophy
acceptanceCriteria: About section provides clear information about coaching methodology
Content builds trust and establishes credibility
Section is easily readable and well-formatted

requirements.text: Implement a contact form with fields for name, email, and message to enable client inquiries
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes required fields: name, email, and message
Form validates user input before submission
Submitted inquiries are stored in the backend
User receives confirmation after successful submission

requirements.text: Design a testimonials or social proof section to build credibility
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section displays client feedback
Layout accommodates multiple testimonial entries
Design enhances trustworthiness of the coaching services

requirements.text: Apply a warm, professional visual theme with cohesive color palette, modern typography, and inviting layout that conveys trust and approachability for a coaching business
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm, professional tones that avoid blue and purple
Typography is readable and conveys professionalism
Overall design creates a welcoming and trustworthy impression
Visual style is consistently applied across all sections

required: Professional coaching hero background image showing supportive, uplifting atmosphere (hero-coaching.dim_1920x1080.png)
Warm, abstract icon representing personal growth and development (growth-icon.dim_256x256.png)
